name: Bite.io
description:
In begging you are less fatty creature, for growing you need to eat small dumpy animals. However you also need to be alert for others hunger players that can eat you. Arrive Bite.io game arena and chew others to become the Fatty one of biters. Bite all others enemies to survive the battle arena.

When you get fatty then you will be dumpy and much more powerful. Eat.io is cool yet very funny game like starving and forages foes by rolling.
